timeline.message:
Replace SegmentMergeLineage to SegmentLineage

With the updated design (#2715) of segment merge, the metadata format
for segment lineage is changed.

1. Added segment lineage class which is a wrapper of ZNRecord
2. Added lineage entry class that represents m->n segment replacement
3. Added unit test

timeline.bodyText: Do we need to worry about uniqueness guarantee?
timeline.author: mayankshriv

replies.bodyText: UUID can have duplicates but with extremely low probability. Based on the number of lineage entries that we will deal with (at most 1000s), UUID should be more than enough for uniqueness guarantee.
replies.author: snleee
